header_1: A confidential service, reserved for exceptional properties.
banner_support_desc: Write to me in complete confidentiality at

form.title: Check your property's eligibility
form.desc:
Off-market marketing at Secretimmo is reserved for prestigious, atypical, or luxury properties.
To verify if your property meets our criteria, we invite you to take an eligibility test.
Your data is treated with strict confidentiality and is never shared without your consent.
form.secretimmo_title: Congratulations, your property is considered exceptional and could be marketed off-market!
form.secretimmo_desc: Please fill out the valuation request form to know the current value of your property.
form.nextimmo_subtitle: Your property is not considered exceptional and cannot be marketed off-market!
form.nextimmo_title: The good news is that through Nextimmo, our on-market sales partner, you can sell it effectively.
form.nextimmo_desc: Please fill out the valuation request form to know the current value of your property.
form.terms_label: By checking this box, you accept our Privacy Policy.
form.first_name_error: First name must be between 2 and 50 characters and contain only letters
form.last_name_error: Last name must be between 2 and 50 characters and contain only letters
form.submit_success: Your request has been successfully sent.
form.submit_error: An error occurred while sending the form. Please try again.
form.min_error: The entered value is too small.
form.max_error: The entered value is too large.

advantages.advantages_title: The advantages of launching the sale of your prestigious property off-market with Secretimmo

items.title: A smooth launch to an exclusive and targeted audience 1
items.content: Present your property to a select group of partner agencies and our base of qualified active buyers, without immediate public exposure.
